node

Class Node_Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • node.Node_Main

  • public class Node_Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Starts the main threads and handles command line arguments.
    Also holds a static method for refreshing the connection to the server. REMEMBER! ALL INTERVALS ARE IN SECONDS!
    Author:
    parisbre56

      • accumulatorConnection

        public static java.net.Socket accumulatorConnection
        The connection to the server.
        Remember that all uses of this object should be synchronized.
        Remember to send a refresh connection request before each communication attempt to ensure that the server knows with which client it is talking to.

      • os

        public static java.io.DataOutputStream os
        Output stream for the server.
        Make sure to synchronize on accumulatorConnection.

      • is

        public static java.io.DataInputStream is
        Input stream for the server.
        Make sure to synchronize on accumulatorConnection.

      • setDataFromFlags

        private static void setDataFromFlags(java.lang.String accumulatorAddress,
                    java.lang.String accumulatorPort)
        Changes the configuration according to the flags set
        Parameters:
        accumulatorAddress - The address of the accumulator. Can be ip (192.168.etc.xyz) or string (www.xxx.yyy). Null means use default.
        accumulatorPort - The port of the accumulator. Null means use default.

      • skipInput

        public static void skipInput()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to clear the input stream of the accumulator connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem with reading

      • refreshConnectionRequest

        public static void refreshConnectionRequest(int retries)
                                     throws NTMonUnableToRefreshException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Sends a refresh request to the server, to ensure that everything is OK with the connection.
        If there is a fatal error, the program starts its exit sequence and throws NTMonUnableToRefreshException
        If the connection is closed, an attempt will be made to reopen it. If it is unable to do so, it will initiate the exit sequence.
        Used by all threads before communication with the accumulator.
        NOT synchronized as the caller should had already done that.
        Parameters:
        retries - How many times this has failed and called itself
        Throws:
        NTMonUnableToRefreshException - If there was a fatal problem with the connection. The program will now EXIT.
        java.io.IOException - If there was a non-fatal communication exception

      • refreshConnectionRequest

        public static void refreshConnectionRequest()
                                     throws NTMonUnableToRefreshException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Sends a refresh request to the server, to ensure that everything is OK with the connection.
        If there is a fatal error, the program starts its exit sequence and throws NTMonUnableToRefreshException!!!
        If the connection is closed, an attempt will be made to reopen it. If it is unable to do so, it will initiate the exit sequence.
        Used by all threads before communication.
        NOT synchronized as the caller should had already done that.
        Throws:
        NTMonUnableToRefreshException - If there was a fatal problem with the connection. The program will now EXIT.
        java.io.IOException - If there was a non-fatal communication exception
